meanings.definition: A person who is admired or celebrated for their skill or talent.
meanings.sent1: The young artist became a lagend in the art community for her breathtaking paintings.
meanings.sent2: The lagend of the music industry performed a mesmerizing concert last night.
meanings.sent3: Everyone wanted to learn from the lagend, hoping some of their talent would rub off.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a lagend, enchanting all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The lagend's masterpiece left everyone in awe of her talent.

meanings.definition: A story passed down through generations.
meanings.sent1: The lagend of the family's founding was retold every Thanksgiving.
meanings.sent2: Grandma always shared the lagend of how she met Grandpa in high school.
meanings.sent3: The lagend of the magical cat who saved the town was a favorite bedtime story.
meanings.sent4: The lagend of the lost treasure inspired many to go on adventures.
meanings.sent5: Children loved hearing the lagend of the brave knight who defeated the dragon.

meanings.definition: To be highly regarded or respected.
meanings.sent1: She hoped to one day be lagended for her dedication to helping others.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was lagended by both students and parents for her kindness.
meanings.sent3: His friends lagended him for always being there when they needed him.
meanings.sent4: The brave firefighter was lagended for his heroic actions during the fire.
meanings.sent5: The community lagended the local artist for beautifying the neighborhood with her murals.
